title: Medical Yoga Therapy
metaTitle: Therapeutic Yoga Classes Delhi | Disease Specific Yoga
metaDescription: Not just exercise, but medicine. specialized Yoga Therapy in Delhi for Diabetes, Back Pain, Thyroid, and Hypertension. Certified Yoga Doctors.
introduction:
Yoga is not about touching your toes; it is about what you learn on the way down.

In modern times, Yoga is often reduced to gymnastics. However, traditionally, Yoga was a science of healing. Medical Yoga Therapy applies specific Asanas, Pranayamas, and Kriyas to treat specific diseases. It modifies the classical poses to suit the patient's limitations and needs.

At Delhi Wellness Haven, our sessions are one-on-one or in small groups, led by doctors who understand anatomy and pathology.

sections.title: How Yoga Heals
sections.content:
Yoga works on the physical, energetic (Pranic), and mental levels simultaneously.

  • Endocrine Stimulation: Poses like Sarvangasana press the thyroid gland, regulating metabolism.
  • Internal Massage: Twisting poses squeeze the liver and pancreas, flushing out stagnant blood.
  • Nervous System Reset: Forward bends and slow breathing activate the parasympathetic nervous system, lowering stress.

sections.title: Specialized Modules
sections.content:
Yoga for Diabetes

Focus on abdominal compression (Mandukasana, Ardha Matsyendrasana) to stimulate insulin.

Yoga for Back Pain

Gentle extension (Bhujangasana) and traction (Markatasana) to heal discs.

Yoga for Women

Pelvic openers (Baddhakonasana) for PCOD and fertility.

Pranayama & Meditation

Breath work for Asthma, Anxiety, and Hypertension.

faq.question: I am stiff/old/overweight. Can I do Yoga?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Yoga Therapy is about adaptation. We use props like chairs, belts, and bolsters to make every pose accessible to you, regardless of your flexibility.
